verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>,
No doubt <S%H551><s%> but ye are the people <S%H5971><s%>, And wisdom <S%H2451><s%> shall die with you <S%H4191><s%>.
But <S%H1571><s%> I have understanding <S%H3824><s%> as well as you <S%H5307><s%>; I am not inferior to you <S%H3644><s%>: Yea, who knoweth not such things as these?

I am as one that is a laughing-stock <S%H7814><s%> to his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, I who called <S%H7121><s%> upon God <S%H433><s%>, and he answered <S%H6030><s%>: The just <S%H6662><s%>, the perfect <S%H8549><s%> man is a laughing-stock <S%H7814><s%>.

In the thought <S%H6248><s%> of him that is at ease <S%H7600><s%> there is contempt <S%H3940><s%> for misfortune <S%H937><s%>; It is ready <S%H3559><s%> for them whose foot <S%H7272><s%> slippeth <S%H4571><s%>.

The tents <S%H168><s%> of robbers <S%H7703><s%> prosper <S%H7951><s%>, And they that provoke <S%H7264><s%> God <S%H410><s%> are secure <S%H987><s%>; Into whose hand <S%H3027><s%> God <S%H433><s%> bringeth abundantly <S%H935><s%>.

But <S%H199><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> now the beasts <S%H929><s%>, and they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> thee <S%H5775><s%>; And the birds of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and they shall tell thee <S%H5046><s%>:
Or speak <S%H7878><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it shall teach <S%H3384><s%> thee <S%H1709><s%>; And the fishes of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall declare unto thee <S%H5608><s%>.
Who knoweth <S%H3045><s%> not in all these <S%H3027><s%>, That the hand of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath wrought this <S%H6213><s%>,
In whose hand <S%H3027><s%> is the soul <S%H5315><s%> of every living thing <S%H2416><s%>, And the breath <S%H7307><s%> of all mankind <S%H376><s%>?
Doth not the ear <S%H241><s%> try <S%H974><s%> words <S%H4405><s%>, Even as the palate <S%H2441><s%> tasteth <S%H2938><s%> its food <S%H400><s%>?
With aged <S%H3453><s%> men is wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, And in length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
With God is wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and might <S%H1369><s%>; He hath counsel <S%H6098><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
Behold <S%H2040><s%>, he breaketh down, and it cannot be built again <S%H1129><s%>; He shutteth up <S%H5462><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>, and there can be no opening <S%H6605><s%>.
Behold <S%H6113><s%>, he withholdeth the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and they dry up <S%H3001><s%>; Again <S%H7971><s%>, he sendeth them out, and they overturn <S%H2015><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
With him is strength <S%H5797><s%> and wisdom <S%H8454><s%>; The deceived <S%H7683><s%> and the deceiver are his <S%H7686><s%>.
He leadeth <S%H3212><s%> counsellors <S%H3289><s%> away stripped <S%H7758><s%>, And judges <S%H8199><s%> maketh he fools <S%H1984><s%>.
He looseth <S%H6605><s%> the bond <S%H4148><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>, And he bindeth <S%H631><s%> their loins <S%H4975><s%> with a girdle <S%H232><s%>.
He leadeth <S%H3212><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> away stripped <S%H7758><s%>, And overthroweth <S%H5557><s%> the mighty <S%H386><s%>.
He removeth <S%H5493><s%> the speech <S%H8193><s%> of the trusty <S%H539><s%>, And taketh away <S%H3947><s%> the understanding <S%H2940><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%>.
He poureth <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> upon princes <S%H5081><s%>, And looseth <S%H7503><s%> the belt <S%H4206><s%> of the strong <S%H4206><s%>.
He uncovereth <S%H1540><s%> deep things <S%H6013><s%> out of darkness <S%H2822><s%>, And bringeth out <S%H3318><s%> to light <S%H216><s%> the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>.
He increaseth <S%H7679><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and he destroyeth <S%H6><s%> them <S%H7849><s%>: He enlargeth the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and he leadeth them captive <S%H5148><s%>.

He taketh away <S%H5493><s%> understanding <S%H3820><s%> from the chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, And causeth them to wander <S%H8582><s%> in a wilderness <S%H8414><s%> where there is no way <S%H1870><s%>.
They grope <S%H4959><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%> without light <S%H216><s%>; And he maketh them to stagger <S%H8582><s%> like a drunken man <S%H7910><s%>.
